title: AJKS124
author: AJKS124
content: Hello,Is this exchange  bitstenproole.com reliable to do crypto currency trading?Thanks/AJKS124

comments.author: btc78
comments.created_time: July 02, 2023, 03:13:43 AMLast edit: July 09, 2023, 05:21:32 AM by btc78
comments.body: Quote from: AJKS124 on July 02, 2023, 03:09:05 AMHello,Is this exchange  bitstenproole.com reliable to do crypto currency trading?Thanks/AJKS124 why of all existing exchange you come here to ask this never heard one and you asking as a Newbie? please tell what is your main objective here? is this for promotion ? sorry but there are Binance and other exchange that is legit and serving people for years but not this one.and seriously ? a Chinese exchange?  where did you get this? or are you part of the team who promotes this for free?

comments.author: yudi09
comments.body: Quote from: AJKS124 on July 02, 2023, 03:09:05 AMIs this exchange  bitstenproole.com reliable to do crypto currency trading?I have tried to search for the exchange you asked about. From what I can see, this exchange operates in the Asia region which is their center.When I try to search with the search keyword "bitstenproole", the results appear as shown in the image.If that's the case, then you need to be careful if you have the desire to register and make transactionsI want to convey, this topic is more suitable if the discussion is moved to the exchange board. There has become a place for discussion related to exchange.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: AJKS124 on July 02, 2023, 03:09:05 AMIs this exchange  bitstenproole.com reliable to do crypto currency trading?Do not use the exchange. Its domain was created not quite longCode:Domain:bitstenproole.comRegistrar:PDR Ltd. d/b/a PublicDomainRegistry.comRegistered On:2023-05-15Expires On:2024-05-15Updated On:2023-05-15The domain was registered just one and half months ago. Use those better exchanges instead. Better exchanges:https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchangesDo not leave your coins on exchanges. Not your keys not your coins.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on July 02, 2023, 04:51:21 AMThe domain was registered just one and half months ago. Use those better exchanges instead. Better exchanges:https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchangesDo not leave your coins on exchanges. Not your keys not your coins.Not to be harsh here but if actually the domain was created just less two months ago and this is the first post by OP, just less than an hour after creation of the account to ask about the exchange , then it is clear enough that this is a promotional post for the exchange. Because even for a pro it will take so time to find this exchange out. But nonetheless OP I would strong adhere you to stick to Oshosondy advice not to leave coins on exchanges. In fact I would advise you not to rely too much on centralized exchanges just for privacy sake. Here is a filtered list of decentralized exchanges for you.  kycnot.me.

comments.author: KiaKia
comments.body: It's hard to tell if you are doing this knowing that you are stylishly creating awareness for that piece of trash called an exchange, even the worst crypto exchanges in crypto space are better than this trash.I am wondering who told you about this exchange because I see that it's not popular and it looks like a scamming den for those who know nothing about crypto exchanges. Apologized if you aren't the actor yourself, and my advice is use something that others are using, they are there before you, they have past experience, stay away from any new thing in crypto space.Go Binance, Coinbase, OkeX, MeXc, Kraken, Bybit, Bitfinex, Bitget, Upbit, Huobi, BitMart, Gemini and so on.... What the hell is Bitstenproole if not a scam?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: btc78 on July 02, 2023, 03:13:43 AMand seriously ? a Chinese exchange?  bitstenproole.com/#/home where did you get this? or are you part of the team who promotes this for free?I think you are the one who promoting it look at your post you put the whole URL it will help to get backlinks here on the forum.If I were you better edit your post and remove the backlink.And another thing about this site almost all pages of this exchange are protected from copy-pasting(planning to copy content to check for plagiarism) I tried to disable javascript and it stuck on loading and look at this image below I tried accessing it through Brave.He might be using some script that can track you better be careful.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: AJKS124 on July 02, 2023, 03:09:05 AMIs this exchange  bitstenproole.com reliable to do crypto currency trading?The community in this Forum including me for bitstenproole.com exchange, very foreign untouched, I see the exchange is very new WHOIS registered on 15-05-2023.Your, might try to check at: bitstenproole.com Reviews.QuoteWebsitebitstenproole.comTitleBitsten ProDomain age1 month from nowWebsite SpeedVery FastSSL certificate validvalidSSL typeMedium - Organization Validated Certificates (OV SSL)SSL issuerCloudflare, Inc.WHOIS registration date2023-05-15WHOIS last update date2023-05-15WHOIS renew date2024-05-15However, for me personally, to be honest I would avoid exchanges that are just operating, lately many web exchanges have ended tragically, so you have to be very careful using newly released exchanges, especially when it comes to trading your crypto assets.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: @OP, that's not even a familiar exchange to majority here. So, I think that you know what to do if you're planning to trade there but there's also this thought of mine that this is likely a shill from a newbie account. Despite not being familiar to everyone here, you just tried to give some exposure on it through asking if it's a good place or not. I guess that you've just successfully made our curiosity hit but still, thanks but no thanks we won't trade there.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Aren't we jumping the gun here? OP did not even posted a clickable link nor defended the exchange with their whole life. Imo it's too early too say the post is for promotion. Yes, the website is new but I'd give op the benefit of the doubt since scam DMs have been pretty rampant and it's not that rare for victims of crypto romance scams/pig butchering to fall for a new/no one has heard of exchange.Back to OP's question: for safety, it is best to play it safe by staying away from any zero reputation exchanges like bitsten-whatever-dot-com specially if it was a recommendation from an internet stranger.

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: OP, I don't want to accuse you without solid evidences but it looks like you created this topic just to promote that website and get a one more backlink.Anyway, in case your question is genuine, I advice you and everyone else to stay away from this so-called exchange as there are many red flags and you are likely to lose your money if you use it.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: khaled0111 on July 02, 2023, 08:56:09 PMOP, I don't want to accuse you without solid evidences but it looks like you created this topic just to promote that website and get a one more backlink.That's the first thing I think whenever I see a topic like this, where an innocent beginner asks for an opinion about some poor site that presents itself as an exchange.When I go to the site, the first thing that sets off the alarm for me is the worn-out marketing slogan "The most trusted cryptocurrency trading platform". Or counter which says 10 million users... At the same time, there is not a single piece of information about who is behind the "exchange", team members, where the company is registered...So, bitstenproole.com is an obvious scam and everyone needs to stay away from there.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on July 02, 2023, 02:36:50 PMQuote from: btc78 on July 02, 2023, 03:13:43 AMand seriously ? a Chinese exchange?  bitstenproole.com/#/home where did you get this? or are you part of the team who promotes this for free?I think you are the one who promoting it look at your post you put the whole URL it will help to get backlinks here on the forum.If I were you better edit your post and remove the backlink.Oopps , yeah Sorry for that  i just now realized my mistake and edited the post taking out the link .QuoteAnd another thing about this site almost all pages of this exchange are protected from copy-pasting(planning to copy content to check for plagiarism) I tried to disable javascript and it stuck on loading and look at this image below I tried accessing it through Brave.He might be using some script that can track you better be careful.also thanks for the warning as this is what I also believe since I read the thread .

comments.author: rby
comments.body: Quote from: btc78 on July 02, 2023, 03:13:43 AMQuote from: AJKS124 on July 02, 2023, 03:09:05 AMHello,Is this exchange  bitstenproole.com reliable to do crypto currency trading?Thanks/AJKS124 why of all existing exchange you come here to ask this never heard one and you asking as a Newbie? TBH, there are some projects I will not recommend that anyone should embark despite how prepared you feel you are or how experienced your team is. The exchanges business is a project I will be skeptical to take up. Reasons be; Exchanges are recently not in the good book of cryptocurrency. Following the collapse of arguably one of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges, people are very skeptical of exchanges. Even upto loosing confidence in their most trusted exchanges. It is at this very time you will expect many people to patronising your new untested and unreliable project?New gambling companies come with alot of bonuses for new users.  This I understand encourages old gamblers to be able to try new gambling projects.  Then, what will be the reason of anyone to leave their somewhat reputable and trusted exchanges to experiment with a poorly designed relatively new one?Quote from: btc78 on July 02, 2023, 03:13:43 AMplease tell what is your main objective here? is this for promotion ? sorry but there are Binance and other exchange that is legit and serving people for years but not this one.There is this saying I cannot recall verbatim. But is says about being better to have a good promoter and a bad project than the reverse. The method some project owners use to announce their project is very laughable. In the internet anything goes
